title: Book Bazaar
description: A website that is made for those up and coming authors who don't have the money to pay for a publisher. Can easily upload your books to book bazaar and start making sales and a profit. It's also for those readers who are looking for a different author.

title: Air Canada Industry Project
description: As part of an Air Canada project, our team of software engineers, data scientists, and UX designers collaborated to improve the Aeroplan webpage. We used data analysis and technical expertise to enhance usability and create a streamlined user experience, resulting in increased customer satisfaction.

title: Trivia Trials
description: In a hackathon working with Hilary and Justin, we created Trivia Trials which is an exciting game featuring 100+ questions and 4 possible answers, similar to Who Wants to Be a Millionaire. Challenge yourself and friends to test your knowledge and become the ultimate trivia champion!

title: ActiNext
description: As part of paired-programming challenge with Dixon, we created ActiNext which is a website for indecisive people. With over 50 activities to choose from, it suggests options like reading, hiking, or road-tripping. Never be bored again!

title: Jesse's Portfolio
description: As a skilled software engineer, my portfolio showcases my projects, skills, and experience. With an easy-to-use contact form, it's simple to hire me for your next project. Let's bring your ideas to life together.
